body:
According to its README, this project moved.

@srekolam @arjun-raj-kuppala do we need a new package for this tool in Spack or does it get shipped with the `hip` package? :)
Update: the new Spack package is called `rocm-smi-lib`.

References:
- https://github.com/RadeonOpenCompute/ROC-smi#rocm-system-management-interface
- https://github.com/RadeonOpenCompute/rocm_smi_lib/tree/master/python_smi_tools
title: rocm-smi: project moved (deprecate)
